def_cn: 不透气的；气密的；密封的
def_en: If a container is airtight, its lid fits so tightly that no air can get in or out.

def_cn: （不在场证据或案件、契约、论据）无懈可击的，没有漏洞的，严密的
def_en: An airtight alibi, case, argument, or agreement is one that has been so carefully put together that nobody will be able to find a fault in it.
